alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 8:02AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Sussex, southwestern Kent, east central Talbot and Caroline Counties through 830 AM EDT... At 801 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harmony, or 8 miles east of Easton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Denton, Federalsburg, Bridgeville, Preston, Tanyard, Harmony, Smithville, Agner, Matthews, Choptank, Griffin, Windyhill, Andrewsville, Cordova and Greenwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
